altTitles.vi: Đối Kháng Hoa Tâm Chủ Thượng

description.en:
Wu Lian and Gu Xiaochen are classmates who have very different positions and social standing. After four years, when Xiaoclihen joins a company as an employee, she finds out Wu Lian is her boss!. A heartwarming and quirky love story between a playboy and the timid violet of the office!

---
This is a story of a Cinderella who meets a bad-tempered prince. 

We all want to live a wonderful life. and we may never ask for a life that is so gorgeous and charming, or a love that is so exciting. All we ask for is to exist in peace and security, and that is an indispensable part of a wonderful life. The momentary fragrance is just a blink of an eye, and so is love.

---
**Original Web Comic:** [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27094), [iQiyi](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzmfx339.html), [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/4860/), [U17](https://www.u17.com/chapter/889522.html)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Mangatoon](https://mangatoon.mobi/en/flirty-boss-no?content_id=46797), [WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/My-Boss-My-Sweetest-Enemy/632967c28c252b2cd8180c14)
description.zh:
这是一个灰姑娘遇坏脾气王子的故事，人一世物一世，我们都希望自己能够活得精彩，可能从没奢求过生活有多绚烂迷人，爱情有多轰烈动人，求的仅是安安稳稳地存在着，那就是一份不可或缺的精彩，刹那芳华也只是那一刻烁眼，爱情其实也是这个道理。

---
**Original Web Comic:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/643789), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27094), [iQiyi](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzmfx339.html), [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/4860/), [U17](https://www.u17.com/chapter/889522.html)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [BiliBili](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc2758), [INKR](https://inkr.com/title/373), [WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/My-Boss-My-Sweetest-Enemy/632967c28c252b2cd8180c14)
